fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: If this is checked the product will not be published

fields.name: title
fields.label: Product Name
fields.description: The product's name

fields.name: description
fields.label: Product Description
fields.description: The product's description

fields.name: price
fields.label: Price (£)
fields.description: Product price in pounds

fields.name: basePrice
fields.label: Base Price (£)
fields.description: Base price for products with variants (optional - defaults to price)

fields.name: sku
fields.label: SKU
fields.description: Stock Keeping Unit / Product Code

fields.name: stripeProductId
fields.label: Stripe Product ID
fields.description: The Stripe product ID for checkout integration

fields.name: inStock
fields.label: In Stock
fields.description: Whether this product is currently available

fields.name: featured
fields.label: Featured Product
fields.description: Show this product prominently in shop listings

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: Product category

fields.name: src
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Upload product image in JPEG or PNG format with minimum width of 2000 pixels

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: Descriptive image caption, used for alt text

fields.name: variants
fields.label: Product Variants
fields.description: Size options, color variants, etc.

fields.name: name
fields.label: Variant Name
fields.description: e.g., 'Size', 'Color', 'Frame'

fields.name: type
fields.label: Variant Type
fields.description: How this variant should be displayed

fields.name: required
fields.label: Required
fields.description: Must customer select this variant?

fields.name: value
fields.label: Value
fields.description: Internal value (e.g., 'S', 'M', 'L')

fields.name: label
fields.label: Display Label
fields.description: What customers see (e.g., 'Small', 'Medium', 'Large')

fields.name: price
fields.label: Price (£)
fields.description: Price for this variant

fields.name: inStock
fields.label: In Stock
fields.description: Is this variant available?

fields.name: dimensions
fields.label: Dimensions
fields.description: Product dimensions (for prints, apparel sizing, etc.)

fields.name: date
fields.label: Date Added
fields.description: When this product was added

fields.name: title
fields.label: SEO Title
fields.description: Title for SEO purposes. Defaults to product name

fields.name: description
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: Meta description for SEO. Defaults to product description

fields.name: body
fields.label: Additional Details
fields.description: Additional product details, care instructions, etc.

fields.name: position
fields.label: Display Position
fields.description: Product position in shop listings (0-999, lower = higher position)

fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: If this is checked the project will not be published

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The project's title

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: The project's short description

fields.name: year
fields.label: Year
fields.description: The year the project was realized e.g. 2023

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: Project caption

fields.name: video
fields.label: Video URL
fields.description: Path to video file

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.label: Video Thumbnail
fields.description: Path to video thumbnail image

fields.name: layout
fields.label: Layout
fields.description: Layout template

fields.name: permalink
fields.label: Permalink
fields.description: Custom permalink

fields.name: src
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Upload an image in JPEG or PNG format with a minimum width of 2000 pixels

fields.name: caption
fields.label: Caption
fields.description: Add a descriptive image caption, used for the image alt text

fields.name: date
fields.label: Publish Date
fields.description: The published date or today's date (for internal use only)

fields.name: title
fields.label: SEO Title
fields.description: Add a different title for SEO purposes (the <title> tag). Defaults to project title

fields.name: description
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: Add a meta description for SEO purposes. Defaults to project short description

fields.name: no_index
fields.label: Prevent Indexing
fields.description: Warning: Adds a <meta> noindex tag to this project to discourage search engines from indexing it. Use with care!

fields.name: body
fields.label: Additional Description
fields.description: The project's optional additional description, shown under images

fields.name: position
fields.label: Project Position
fields.description: Adjust this project's position in the project list, as a number between 0 and 999. A lower value pushes the position up.

fields.name: site_url
fields.label: Site URL
fields.description: Your site's full production URL including https:// and without a trailing slash e.g. https://www.johndoe.com

fields.name: site_title
fields.label: Site Title
fields.description: The website title, name, or brand e.g. John Doe

fields.name: site_subtitle_1
fields.label: Site Subtitle
fields.description: Optional text shown after the website title, often used for a job title e.g. Photographer

fields.name: site_subtitle_2
fields.label: Additional Site Subtitle
fields.description: Optional text shown after the site subtitle, often used to show a location e.g. New York, NY

fields.name: site_description
fields.label: Site Description
fields.description: Your website's description, shown on the home page only. Keep it short and sweet!

fields.name: site_email
fields.label: Site Email
fields.description: Your website's contact email address, visible in the site footer.

fields.name: site_social_url
fields.label: Site Social URL
fields.description: Your primary social media profile URL, visible in the site footer e.g. https://instagram.com/johndoe

fields.name: site_icon_svg
fields.label: Site Favicon SVG
fields.description: An optional site bookmark/favicon icon in SVG format. Make an SVG favicon here: https://realfavicongenerator.net/svg-favicon/

fields.name: site_icon_png
fields.label: Site Favicon PNG
fields.description: An optional site bookmark/favicon icon in PNG format. Your image should be 260x260 pixels or more for optimal results. Make a PNG and SVG favicon here: https://realfavicongenerator.net/svg-favicon/

fields.name: site_ga4_id
fields.label: Google Analytics ID
fields.description: Add a valid GA4 property ID here to enable Google Analytics on your site e.g. G-1234567

fields.name: site_title
fields.label: Site SEO Title
fields.description: The website title used for SEO purposes i.e. the <title> tag and social sharing only.

fields.name: site_description
fields.label: Site SEO Description
fields.description: The website description used for the <meta> description tag and social sharing. This is the description that will likely be shown in Google search results for your site. Maximum 160 characters.

fields.name: no_index
fields.label: Block Site Indexing
fields.description: Warning: Adds a <meta> noindex tag to EVERY page of your website to discourage search engines from indexing them. Overrides per-project settings. Use with care!

fields.label: Space Scale
fields.name: space_scale
fields.description: The percentage scale used to calculate your site's margins, padding, and line height. Default: 100

fields.name: background
fields.label: Background Color
fields.description: The site background color, also used for light mode. Default: #FFFFFF

fields.name: text
fields.label: Text Color
fields.description: The site text color, also used for light mode. Default: #101010

fields.name: link
fields.label: Link Color
fields.description: The site link text color, also used for light mode. Default: #101010

fields.name: background_dark
fields.label: Dark Mode Background Color
fields.description: The site's dark mode background color. Default: #101010

fields.name: text_dark
fields.label: Dark Mode Text Color
fields.description: The site's dark mode text color. Default: #F1F1F1

fields.name: link_dark
fields.label: Dark Mode Link Color
fields.description: The site's dark mode link text color. Default: #F1F1F1

fields.name: font
fields.label: Font
fields.description: Your site's body font. Select a Google Font or the default system font from the dropdown

fields.name: font_weight
fields.label: Font Weight
fields.description: The site's body font weight. Values range from 100 to 900. Default: 420. See valid weight ranges for Google Fonts variable fonts here: https://fonts.google.com/?vfonly=true

fields.name: font_scale
fields.label: Font Size Scale
fields.description: The percentage scale used to adjust your site's font size. Default: 100

fields.name: line_height_scale
fields.label: Line Height Scale
fields.description: The percentage scale used to adjust your site font's line height (vertical spacing). Default: 100

fields.name: enable_dark_mode
fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.description: Enable the dark mode toggle for your site

fields.name: item_output_limit
fields.label: Max. Project Grid Items
fields.description: The maximum number of project grid items displayed. Default: 48

fields.name: transition_duration
fields.label: Transition Duration
fields.description: The length in milliseconds of site animations and transitions. Default: 300

fields.name: show_project_year
fields.label: Show Project Year
fields.description: Show the project year on your site's project pages. Default: true

fields.name: show_project_grid_titles
fields.label: Show Grid Titles
fields.description: Show project titles in your site's project lists. Default: true

fields.name: images
fields.label: Images
fields.description: Configure responsive image formats and quality settings

fields.name: enabled
fields.label: Enabled
fields.description: Enable AVIF Images?

fields.name: quality
fields.label: AVIF Image Quality
fields.description: Controls AVIF image compression, from 1-100. A lower value means smaller file sizes but lower image quality. Default: 80

fields.name: enabled
fields.label: Enabled
fields.description: Enable WebP Images?

fields.name: quality
fields.label: WebP Image Quality
fields.description: Controls WebP image compression, from 1-100. A lower value means smaller file sizes but lower image quality. Default: 80

fields.name: enabled
fields.label: JPEG Enabled
fields.description: JPEG Images must be enabled.

fields.name: quality
fields.label: JPEG Image Quality
fields.description: Controls JPEG image compression, from 1-100. A lower value means smaller file sizes but lower image quality. Default: 80

fields.name: site_language
fields.label: Site Language
fields.description: Your site's ISO 639-1 two character language code. Default: en

fields.name: site_social_title
fields.label: Footer Social Title
fields.description: The title used for footer social profile link text e.g. Instagram

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
